definition: worker who is capable but unpleasant to deal with
durian fruit/also written 榴槤果|榴梿果

sentences.english: A：Durian is my favorite fruit. I think it tastes very delicious.
sentences.chinese: 榴莲是我最爱吃的水果，我觉得味道实在是太好了。

sentences.english: I don't like durians especially their strong odd smell.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜欢榴莲，特别是那股浓烈的怪味。

sentences.english: Before you see the durian, you know it is there.
sentences.chinese: 你还没看到榴莲时，你就会知道它在那里了。

sentences.english: So, "durian, " a fruit specific to Southeast Asia, has been changed to a more widely understood "jackfruit."
sentences.chinese: 例如，东南亚特产水果榴莲被改作能更好理解的菠萝。

sentences.english: Ex:I wrote a 100-page-dissertation on how a "daisy" can swallow adurian.
sentences.chinese: 我写了100页有关菊花如何吞下榴莲的论文。

sentences.english: Lichee and durian fruit are newer flavors.
sentences.chinese: 荔枝和榴莲是较新的口味。

sentences.english: But durian lovers are horrified by the prospect of a no-smell durian.
sentences.chinese: 然而，榴莲爱好者对无臭榴莲的发展前景大为恐惧。

sentences.english: But durian lovers are horrified by the prospect of a no-smell durian.
sentences.chinese: 然而，榴莲爱好者对无臭榴莲的发展前景大为恐惧。

sentences.english: The strong durian smell repels me.
But actually he called to say he had arranged to send me some durians.
sentences.chinese: 但他只是想告诉我，他安排送榴莲给我。

sentences.english: Because very satisfied, tasted a durian ice cream and water crab porridge.
sentences.chinese: 因为很饱，只尝了榴莲雪糕和水蟹粥。

sentences.english: Ex:I write a 100-page-dissertation on how a "daisy" can swwhichleow a durian.
sentences.chinese: 我写了100页有关菊花怎能吞下榴莲的论文。

sentences.english: Durian has been downgraded to a tropical storm and is heading west across the Gulf of Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 榴莲已经降级为热带风暴，正穿过泰国湾向西移动。

sentences.english: The durians are beside the plums.

definition: variant of 榴蓮|榴莲[liu2 lian2]
